channel.title: Search on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Search on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: FO - Search - Search product bar, consult autocomplete list
item.description: FO - Search - Search product bar, consult autocomplete list Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1229 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/FO/classic/07_search/01_consultAutocompleteList.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Click on the search bar on the header > Write a word on it (min 3 characters length) * The autocomplete list is displayed with 7 products * The search bar in the header keeps the word written Click outside The autocomplete list is not displayed Case 1: With “Mug” products

item.title: FO - Search - Search a product and validate
item.description: FO - Search - Search a product and validate Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1230 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/FO/classic/07_search/02_searchProduct.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Click on the search bar on the header > Write a word on it (min 3 characters length) The autocomplete list is displayed with 3 products with all “notebook” characters on products title Case 1: Choose a product on the list

item.title: FO - Search - Search no result
item.description: FO - Search - Search no result Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1231 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/FO/classic/07_search/03_searchNoResult.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Case 1: With less than 3 characters Go to FO > Click on the search bar on the header > Write a word on it (less than 3 characters length) and click on “Enter” * No autocomplete list is displayed
